summary:
Headquartered in London, LabGenius is a next-generation antibody discovery company that combines synthetic biology, robotic automation and machine learning to accelerate the development of high-performing therapeutics.

LabGenius is actively pursuing a wholly-owned pipeline of immunotherapies for the treatment of solid tumours and recently published research showcasing its ability to discover best-in-class immune cell engagers.

In addition, LabGenius works with partners to leverage its ML-driven discovery platform across a range of antibody formats and therapeutic areas.

Reach out to me here or via blaine.mckeever@labgeni.us for a confidential discussion if you'd like to know more about what we do and where you might help us usher in next-gen therapeutic antibodies.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Well established 360° recruiter with a broad successful track record within several highly technical and competitive industries. Strong knowledge base surrounding the full A - Z of drug and device development.

💉 Biotech - Gene Therapy, Cell Therapy (CAR-T, TCR, NK Cells), Stem Cell Therapy (iPSC, ASC, ESC), Small Molecule, Antibody/ADCs & Microbiome 
‣ Preclinical
‣ Translational
‣ Process Development
‣ Bioprocessing & MSAT 

💊 Pharmaceutical - Drug Product, Drug Substance, API, Finished Product, Packaging
‣ Large-scale manufacturing 
‣ Quality Assurance 
‣ Quality Control 
‣ Commercial 

🔌 Medical Devices - Class I -> III
‣ Regulatory Affairs
‣ Quality Assurance 
‣ Design Assurance 
‣ Commercial 
‣ R&D 

🔬 IVD/Diagnostics - Class I -> III
‣ Quality Assurance
‣ Commercial 
‣ R&D

📍 Europe (UK, Ireland, France, Germany, Switzerland, Belgium, Sweden, Denmark)
📍 USA (Boston, North Carolina, Maryland)

currentPositions.description:
Responsibilities include: 
• tracking current and future hiring needs
• advertising job openings online
• headhunting/sourcing pipelines 
• conducting stay interviews 
• leading restructuring proposals (new functions, company wide leveling changes etc.) 
• stalkeholder management and market research 
• website marketing 
• office management 
• improving time to fill and time to hire 
• reducing attrition 
• driving DE&I initiatives 
• providing company wide updates and presentations on a variety of subjects
• training staff on best interview methods and techniques 

Chairman of the Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Forum + driving force behind the Social Committee.
currentPositions.title: Talent Manager

fieldsOfStudy: Politics & International Relations and Information & Social Computing

headline: Talent Manager at LabGenius

certifications.name: Be an Inclusive Organization People Won't Leave
